snippet: It took four seasons, but Coach Tom Crean and the Hoosiers will make their first appearance together in the N.C.A.A. tournament on Thursday as a No. 4 seed.
lead_paragraph: It took four seasons, but Coach Tom Crean and the Hoosiers will make their first appearance together in the N.C.A.A. tournament on Thursday as a No. 4 seed.

headline.seo: With Tough Love, Crean Makes Indiana Relevant Again
headline.main: Using Tough Love, Crean Is Restoring Hoosiers to Relevance
headline.print_headline: Using Tough Love, Crean Is Restoring Hoosiers to Relevance
